# **LIDD coding support**

This website provides additional resources related to the LIDD coding platform. To facilitate the coding you can get direct access to supporting documentation such as: the project framework, the list of questionnaires per instrument, core working definitions anda additional documentation. 

## How to use

1. See the [Support Documents](https://fmendez72.github.io/lidd/SupportDocuments.html) tab for further information regarding the instruments of Direct Democracy. 

2. See the [Links page](https://fmendez72.github.io/lidd/Links.html) for lots of helpful links.


3. If you have further queries, you can contact the LIDD team here [to do create LIDD email account].
